newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romanian leu 3,768 to dollar for Dec 16-BNR.
newsitem.headline: Romanian leu 3,768 to dollar for Dec 16-BNR.

text.p: Romania's National Bank (BNR) announced the leu's reference rate weaker at 3,768 to the dollar for December 16.
This reference rate was set on Thursday as a weighted average based on daily reports of foreign exchange operators. It is a guidance rate used for statistical accounting purposes.
The leu's reference rate set on Wednesday for December 13 to 15 is 3,732 to the dollar. It was 3,687 on Thursday. -- Bucharest Newsroom 40-1 3120264
